TextEng: "I'll be back once I have the activation stone."
"I've decided to butcher you like hogs. It's how I get my kicks."
"I want to ask you some questions."
"What do you know about the magic chains and the central chamber?"
Text: "마법 사슬과 중앙 방에 대해 뭘 알아요?"

TextEng: Do you know where these chains are now?
Text: 그 사슬들이 지금 어디 있는지 알아요?

TextEng: But now the doors are sealed.
"I want to ask about something else."
<StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> "You better tell me where that chain is... I don't want this to get nasty."
Text: <StartCheck>[위협]</Start> "사슬 어디 있는지 말하는 게 좋을 거야... 일이 험해지는 건 원치 않거든."

TextEng: "Then I guess I'll have to beat it out of you!"
<StartCheck>[Persuade - Flirt]</Start> "Do I look like someone who'd betray you? Come on... you can trust me."
Text: <StartCheck>[설득 - 유혹]</Start> "내가 배신할 사람처럼 보여? 이봐... 날 믿어도 돼."

TextEng: "Why have the drow come to Undermountain?"
"What can you tell me about Halaster?"
"Where can I find the activation stone again?"
"I have the activation stone right here."
"Is there something you're not telling me?"
"Never mind. I want to ask you something else."
"Tomi said there was something strange about you."
"You seem awfully defensive about this."
"I think I'll go speak to Linu about this right now."
<StartCheck>[Intelligence]</Start> "Hold on... how did Tomi and Linu get in here without killing the Rakshasa guards?"
Text: <StartCheck>[지능]</Start> "잠깐... 토미와 리누가 락샤사 경비병들을 죽이지 않고 어떻게 들어왔죠?"

TextEng: "I want to ask you some questions."
"Your Rakshasa captors are dead. You're free."
"I killed the Rakshasa - just like I'm going to kill you!"
"Forget it... I just want to kill you."
"Help you? What are you talking about?"
"I'll spare you... for now. Tell me what you know."
"Why would I want to save someone like you?"
"Save you? Save you from what?"
"The Rakshasa are dead. But who are you?"
"I hope there's a point to all this."
"Great. You're free. So get out of here."
"So now that I've killed the Rakshasa, you're free to leave?"
Text: "그럼 내가 락샤사를 죽였으니, 떠날 수 있는 거야?"

TextEng: "I'm too busy to waste my time with this!"
"I could help you find that stone... for the right reward."
Text: "그 돌 찾는 걸 도와줄 수도 있어... 보상만 괜찮다면."

TextEng: "And you want me to find the activation stone?"
"Maybe I could help you find the activation stone."
Text: "활성화 석 찾는 걸 도와줄 수도 있어."

TextEng: "I'll be going now."
"I think I'd rather just slaughter everyone here."
Text: "그냥 여기 있는 놈들 다 도살하는 게 낫겠어."

TextEng: "Okay, I'll try and find the activation stone for you."
"That's okay - I can find it without your help."
"Actually, I'd rather ask you some questions first."
"Okay, where can I find the activation stone?"
Text: "알았어, 활성화 석은 어디서 찾을 수 있어?"

TextEng: "What do you know about those chains?"
